metadata.Title: CVE-2022-3817 on Ubuntu 22.04 ESM (jammy) - medium
metadata.Description: A vulnerability has been found in Axiomatic Bento4 and classified asproblematic. Affected by this vulnerability is an unknown functionality ofthe component mp4mux. The manipulation leads to memory leak. The attack canbe launched remotely. The exploit has been disclosed to the public and maybe used. The associated identifier of this vulnerability is VDB-212683.

criterions.comment: kodi-inputstream-adaptive package in esm-apps/jammy is affected and may need fixing.
